procedure.name: Delivery
procedure.statement: SELECT NO_O_ID FROM NEW_ORDER WHERE NO_D_ID = ? AND NO_W_ID = ? ORDER BY NO_O_ID ASC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

procedure.name: OrderStatus
procedure.statement: SELECT O_ID, O_CARRIER_ID, O_ENTRY_D FROM OORDER WHERE O_W_ID = ? AND O_D_ID = ? AND O_C_ID = ? ORDER BY O_ID DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
